about_the_game:
Trams, Trains and Monorails is an engaging and strategic city-building game where you place hexagonal railway tiles to expand and develop a thriving metropolis. Immerse yourself in a vibrant 3D world where every decision shapes the future of your city.

Key Features


  • Expand your city through strategic placement of railway tiles
  • Watch the city and buildings evolve
  • Connect stations to level up the areas around them and unlock unique buildings
  • Develop Residential, Industrial, Commercial, and Arts Districts
  • Fulfill district-specific mini goals for extra points and additional tiles
  • Experiment with different layouts and connections to maximize your city’s potential.



Build, connect, and transform your city one tile at a time in Trams, Trains and Monorails. Whether you’re a meticulous planner or a spontaneous builder, every tile placement brings a new challenge and endless possibilities. Dive into the captivating world of urban planning and transportation management today!
